titles.title: A bill to designate the United States courthouse under construction in St. Louis, Missouri, as the "Thomas F. Eagleton United States Courthouse", and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary: 8/3/1994--Introduced. Designates the United States courthouse under construction at 111 South Tenth Street in St. Louis, Missouri, as the Thomas F. Eagleton United States Courthouse.
